body_html: @linrio the old Caffe2 repo is not maintained anymore, as the entire code has been copied to the Pytorch repo and is under further development in the Pytorch repo. Why do you need the old Caffe2 repo? As far as I know there were no breaking changes in the repo migration, and the Caffe2 under the Pytorch repo should always work for people who just want the Caffe2 part.
